landing.whoContent: I‘m just a random guy that loves to code. I work mostly as frontend developer, but I love building stuff in Go too. My main knowledge:

minecraftTools.name: Minecraft Tools
minecraftTools.description: Useful tools for the Minecraft game.

softSkillsCheck.name: Soft Skills Check
softSkillsCheck.description: Developed by a volunteer team of students from Faculdade de Tecnologia e Inovação SENAC DF, I was the development leader for this project. This web app aims to provide self-assessments of soft skills.

mcPanelBackend.name: MC Panel Backend
mcPanelBackend.description: A project where some friends could control a Minecraft server hosted in my home. It also had a frontend.

ecommerce.name: Unfinished Go E-commerce
ecommerce.description: In this project I was willing to make a web application for an e-commerce platform using Go only. Eventually, I focused on other things and never finished it, but I learned a lot with it.

paragraphs.p1: Born and raised in Brasília, I currently (Jan 2026) still live here.
paragraphs.p2: Around the age of 8, my mother gave me my first video game as a gift, a modded PlayStation 2. That was when I had my first deeper contact with technology, because besides playing many random games, I was interested in understanding how that beautiful rectangular device worked. I remember doing some research on the internet or asking people, but I didn’t know anyone who could explain in more depth how it worked.
paragraphs.p3: That’s when my interest in technology was sparked. Some time later, my mother bought a computer for us. I remember it had 512MB of RAM or something like that, but I know for a fact I messed it up a lot. I filled that computer with viruses while trying to download and configure mods, discover software, and many other things on that brave machine.

p4.p4_1: Since then, my interest and love for technology has only grown,
p4.p4_2: to see how I would deal with this field, and it turned out I did very well. A lot of what I learned in the past while tinkering with my old and now deceased PC helped me in this area.
p4.p4LinkText: I decided to study IT Management

p5.p5_2: , I ventured into things I had no idea if I would be able to do, but I never gave up. Today I have the pleasure and opportunity to work with what I love, and I don’t intend to stop.

p6.p6_1: Feel free to send me a DM on
